biotools.summary: GITAR (Genome Interaction Tools and Resources) is a standardized, easy to use and flexible solution to manage Hi-C genomic interaction data, from processing to storage and visualization, composed of two modules: HiCtool and a processed data library.

bioschemas.name: GITAR
bioschemas.summary: GITAR (Genome Interaction Tools and Resources) is a standardized, easy to use and flexible solution to manage Hi-C genomic interaction data, from processing to storage and visualization, composed of two modules: HiCtool and a processed data library.
